LanguageData.VFEI_InsertFirstGenomeDesc: Select first genome for the bio-engineering incubator
LanguageData.VFEI_InsertSecondGenomeDesc: Select second genome for the bio-engineering incubator
LanguageData.VFEI_InsertThirdGenomeDesc: Select third genome for the bio-engineering incubator
LanguageData.VFEI_NoGeneticMaterial: There is no genetic material of this type present on the map
LanguageData.VFEI_SelectAtLeastOne: At least one of the three slots in the incubator must be filled with genetic material
LanguageData.VFEI_StartInsertionDesc: Order your colonists to begin inserting genetic material in the incubator. This is a hauling job.
LanguageData.VFEI_RemoveAllGenesDesc: Empty the incubator, removing all genes that might be still stored inside.
LanguageData.VFEI_CancelJobsDesc: Cancels gene insertion. All gene hauling jobs will be cancelled.
LanguageData.VFEI_EngageDesc: Activate Incubator to create a new insectoid from the inserted genetic materials
LanguageData.VFEI_NoGenesFound: Your colonists were unable to retrive the genetic material
LanguageData.VFEI_WaitTillJobsEnd: Genetic material is still being carried to the incubator
LanguageData.VFEI_IncubationInProgress: Incubation in Progress. A {0} will be produced in:
LanguageData.VFEI_NotPowered: The bio-engineering incubator is not powered right now
LanguageData.VFEI_IncubationFailurePower: An incubation progress has failed due to lack of power
LanguageData.VFEI_FailureMonstrosity: Something has gone catastrophically wrong with the incubation progress!
LanguageData.VFEI_FailureDeath: Something has gone wrong with the incubation progress. The insectoid emerges dead
LanguageData.VFEI_FailureDisease: Something has gone wrong with the incubation progress. The insectoid emerges sick
